recipesJson.name: Toffee Custard | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, Folkart, and Guest MlNikon.
This profile was suggested by Emily (MlNikon) to restore her faith in DIY.  It's a simple, but decadent toffee custard that's great as a base or finished recipe. Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 38 at https://youtu.be/MJpVKsQgTMY .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST 

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: I really enjoy the creamy, slightly dark caramel /toffee of this flavor!  I  love the nutty backnotes and the dialed-back sweetness.  I would like more of a fluffy, thick mouthfeel but it's not too far off the mark to stop me from keeping this in my daily rotation.  A really nice toffee custard!

Woah, this is good. I don't know why it took me such a long time to mix it. It has a very "phillip rocke creme de la creme" vibe to it. Really smooth and dark flavor, nothing too crazy or complex, just a very satisfying and tasty mix. Lately Cap vanilla custard hasnt been doing much for me, been getting really burnt from that flavor. This is a great mix that doesnt let it overwhelm at all, and for me makes it very enjoyable again.
